issue.title: Python: Compat broken for pandas==0.18.1
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-944](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-944). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The following failed for me with `pandas==0.18.1`:

```Java
In [1]: from pandas.core.dtypes import DatetimeTZDtype
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
ImportError                               Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-1-cf9e0515688d> in <module>()
----> 1 from pandas.core.dtypes import DatetimeTZDtype

ImportError: No module named dtypes
```
